meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Doug Molitor Cindy Skalsky Ray Allex Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #665.

td.p: Doug Molitor, a writer from Brentwood, California
Cindy Skalsky, originally from Royal Oak, Michigan
Ray Allex, a ticket seller from Los Angeles, California (whose 1-day cash winnings total $7,000)

tr.td: AMERICAN MUSIC
RUBBER
GUAM
POTENT POTABLES
MOVIE DETECTIVES
N.E.W.S.
(Alex: Those letters stand for north, south, east & west.)

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'Some say the song was originally "I can\'t give you anything but love, Lindy", in this man\'s honor')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: Some say the song was originally "I can't give you anything but love, Lindy", in this man's honor
